item.name: All Is Dust
item.text: Each player sacrifices all colored permanents he or she controls.
item.flavorText: "The emergence of the Eldrazi isn't necessarily a bad thing, as long as you've already lived a fulfilling and complete life without regrets." —Javad Nasrin, Ondu relic hunter

item.name: Artisan of Kozilek
item.text: When you cast Artisan of Kozilek, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. Annihilator 2 (Whenever this creature attacks, defending player sacrifices two permanents.)

item.name: Eldrazi Conscription
item.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +10/+10 and has trample and annihilator 2. (Whenever it attacks, defending player sacrifices two permanents.)
item.flavorText: The barest taste of Eldrazi power shatters both realms and identities.

item.name: Emrakul, the Aeons Torn
item.text: Emrakul, the Aeons Torn can't be countered. When you cast Emrakul, take an extra turn after this one. Flying, protection from colored spells, annihilator 6 When Emrakul is put into a graveyard from anywhere, its owner shuffles his or her graveyard into his or her library.

item.name: Hand of Emrakul
item.text: You may sacrifice four Eldrazi Spawn rather than pay Hand of Emrakul's mana cost. Annihilator 1 (Whenever this creature attacks, defending player sacrifices a permanent.)
item.flavorText: "I believed in a beautiful god. But this is the true face of the divine." —Ayli, Kamsa cleric

item.name: Kozilek, Butcher of Truth
item.text: When you cast Kozilek, Butcher of Truth, draw four cards. Annihilator 4 (Whenever this creature attacks, defending player sacrifices four permanents.) When Kozilek is put into a graveyard from anywhere, its owner shuffles his or her graveyard into his or her library.

item.name: It That Betrays
item.text: Annihilator 2 (Whenever this creature attacks, defending player sacrifices two permanents.) Whenever an opponent sacrifices a nontoken permanent, put that card onto the battlefield under your control.
item.flavorText: Your pleas for death shall go unheard.

item.name: Not of This World
item.text: Counter target spell or ability that targets a permanent you control. Not of This World costs {7} less to cast if it targets a spell or ability that targets a creature you control with power 7 or greater.

item.name: Pathrazer of Ulamog
item.text: Annihilator 3 (Whenever this creature attacks, defending player sacrifices three permanents.) Pathrazer of Ulamog can't be blocked except by three or more creatures.
item.flavorText: No thought but hunger. No strategy but destruction.

item.name: Skittering Invasion
item.text: Put five 0/1 colorless Eldrazi Spawn creature tokens onto the battlefield. They have "Sacrifice this creature: Add {1} to your mana pool."
item.flavorText: "The brood spread far faster than we could kill it. I fear the worst is yet to come." —The War Diaries

item.name: Spawnsire of Ulamog
item.text: Annihilator 1 (Whenever this creature attacks, defending player sacrifices a permanent.) {4}: Put two 0/1 colorless Eldrazi Spawn creature tokens onto the battlefield. They have "Sacrifice this creature: Add {1} to your mana pool." {2}0: Cast any number of Eldrazi cards you own from outside the game without paying their mana costs.

item.name: Ulamog, the Infinite Gyre
item.text: When you cast Ulamog, the Infinite Gyre, destroy target permanent. Annihilator 4 (Whenever this creature attacks, defending player sacrifices four permanents.) Ulamog is indestructible. When Ulamog is put into a graveyard from anywhere, its owner shuffles his or her graveyard into his or her library.

item.name: Ulamog's Crusher
item.text: Annihilator 2 (Whenever this creature attacks, defending player sacrifices two permanents.) Ulamog's Crusher attacks each turn if able.
item.flavorText: "Whatever the Eldrazi's purpose is, it has nothing to do with something so insignificant as us." —Nirthu, lone missionary

item.name: Affa Guard Hound
item.text: Flash When Affa Guard Hound enters the battlefield, target creature gets +0/+3 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: Once a welcoming hub for explorers, Affa became a place of guarded tongues and quick defenses.

item.name: Caravan Escort
item.text:
Level up {2} ({2}: Put a level counter on this. Level up only as a sorcery.) LEVEL 1-4 2/2
LEVEL 5+ 5/5 First strike

item.name: Dawnglare Invoker
item.text: Flying {8}: Tap all creatures target player controls.
item.flavorText: "What we knew as Emeria, Ula, and Cosi were not divine beings at all, but a cruel trick, and a grave error." —The Invokers' Tales

item.name: Deathless Angel
item.text: Flying {W}{W}: Target creature is indestructible this turn.
item.flavorText: "I should have died that day, but I suffered not a scratch. I awoke in a lake of blood, none of it apparently my own." —The War Diaries

item.name: Demystify
item.text: Destroy target enchantment.
item.flavorText: The Singing City was silent, the pathway stones were still, and the winds of the Howling Spire ceased.

item.name: Eland Umbra
item.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +0/+4. Totem armor (If enchanted creature would be destroyed, instead remove all damage from it and destroy this Aura.)

item.name: Emerge Unscathed
item.text: Target creature you control gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn. Rebound (If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it as it resolves. At the beginning of your next upkeep, you may cast this card from exile without paying its mana cost.)

item.name: Gideon Jura
item.text: +2: During target opponent's next turn, creatures that player controls attack Gideon Jura if able. -2: Destroy target tapped creature. 0: Until end of turn, Gideon Jura becomes a 6/6 Human Soldier creature that's still a planeswalker. Prevent all damage that would be dealt to him this turn.

item.name: Glory Seeker
item.flavorText: "There's no contract to sign, no oath to swear. The enlistment procedure is to unsheathe your sword and point it at the enemy."

item.name: Guard Duty
item.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has defender.
item.flavorText: "I was told these were standard issue. Do I look standard to you?"

item.name: Harmless Assault
item.text: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn by attacking creatures.
item.flavorText: After encasing it in a paralyzing beam of light, the angel studied the Eldrazi as a child would study a bug, curiously and without fear.

item.name: Hedron-Field Purists
item.text: Level up {2}{W} ({2}{W}: Put a level counter on this. Level up only as a sorcery.) LEVEL 1-4 1/4 If a source would deal damage to you or a creature you control, prevent 1 of that damage. LEVEL 5+ 2/5 If a source would deal damage to you or a creature you control, prevent 2 of that damage.

item.name: Hyena Umbra
item.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has first strike. Totem armor (If enchanted creature would be destroyed, instead remove all damage from it and destroy this Aura.)

item.name: Ikiral Outrider
item.text: Level up {4} ({4}: Put a level counter on this. Level up only as a sorcery.) LEVEL 1-3 2/6 Vigilance LEVEL 4+ 3/10 Vigilance

item.name: Kabira Vindicator
item.text: Level up {2}{W} ({2}{W}: Put a level counter on this. Level up only as a sorcery.) LEVEL 2-4 3/6 Other creatures you control get +1/+1. LEVEL 5+ 4/8 Other creatures you control get +2/+2.

item.name: Knight of Cliffhaven
item.text: Level up {3} ({3}: Put a level counter on this. Level up only as a sorcery.) LEVEL 1-3 2/3 Flying LEVEL 4+ 4/4 Flying, vigilance

item.name: Kor Line-Slinger
item.text: {T}: Tap target creature with power 3 or less.
item.flavorText: "I tried to tell her to stay behind, that this fight was too dangerous. I spent the next hour tied to the rafters." —Zahr Gada, Halimar expedition leader

item.name: Kor Spiritdancer
item.text: Kor Spiritdancer gets +2/+2 for each Aura attached to it. Whenever you cast an Aura spell, you may draw a card.
item.flavorText: She reaches beyond the physical realm, touching the ideals from which all creatures draw their power.

item.name: Lightmine Field
item.text: Whenever one or more creatures attack, Lightmine Field deals damage to each of those creatures equal to the number of attacking creatures.
item.flavorText: If you want to kill a lot of goblins, just make sure your defenses look like fun.

item.name: Linvala, Keeper of Silence
item.text: Flying Activated abilities of creatures your opponents control can't be activated.
item.flavorText: Those who seek to disturb the harmony of life will see their instruments taken from them.

item.name: Lone Missionary
item.text: When Lone Missionary enters the battlefield, you gain 4 life.
item.flavorText: His mission has become a grim pilgrimage, a tour of the Eldrazi-stricken outposts across Zendikar. But he marches on alone, stubborn as the daily dawn.

item.name: Luminous Wake
item.text: Enchant creature Whenever enchanted creature attacks or blocks, you gain 4 life.
item.flavorText: "If destiny's champions have arisen to fight the Ancient Ones, then let me, too, do my part." —Ravuel of Graypelt

item.name: Makindi Griffin
item.text: Flying
item.flavorText: As the hedrons began to coalesce into colossal Eldrazi superstructures, the griffins were forced to seek new territory lest their aeries be crushed between the massive stone monoliths.

item.name: Mammoth Umbra
item.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +3/+3 and has vigilance. Totem armor (If enchanted creature would be destroyed, instead remove all damage from it and destroy this Aura.)

item.name: Near-Death Experience
item.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you have exactly 1 life, you win the game.
item.flavorText: Lands ravaged, cities in ruins, so many lives sacrificed, and yet there was no other word for it but victory.

item.name: Nomads' Assembly
item.text: Put a 1/1 white Kor Soldier creature token onto the battlefield for each creature you control. Rebound (If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it as it resolves. At the beginning of your next upkeep, you may cast this card from exile without paying its mana cost.)

item.name: Oust
item.text: Put target creature into its owner's library second from the top. Its controller gains 3 life.
item.flavorText: "‘Invincible' is just a word." —Gideon Jura

item.name: Puncturing Light
item.text: Destroy target attacking or blocking creature with power 3 or less.
item.flavorText: "The vampires knew what was coming. I know it. And they did nothing. They deserve to feel the same agony they've caused all of us." —Anitan, Ondu cleric

item.name: Repel the Darkness
item.text: Tap up to two target creatures. Draw a card.
item.flavorText: A boon to those who cannot see in the dark. A bane to those who live in it.

item.name: Smite
item.text: Destroy target blocked creature.
item.flavorText: "The mighty rely solely on their strength. They are shocked when we do the same." —Tars Olan, kor world-gift

item.name: Soul's Attendant
item.text: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield, you may gain 1 life.
item.flavorText: In truth, her own faith was gone, trodden in Ulamog's wake. She pantomimed the blessing in the hope that it would inspire others to continue to struggle.

item.name: Soulbound Guardians
item.text: Defender, flying
item.flavorText: The kor's most righteous dead are given the greatest reward: an eternity tied to the land they so cherish.

item.name: Stalwart Shield-Bearers
item.text: Defender Other creatures you control with defender get +0/+2.
item.flavorText: "Hold fast the line! Either we stop them here or we wake up in their guts!" —Tala Vertan, Makindi shieldmate

item.name: Student of Warfare
item.text: Level up {W} ({W}: Put a level counter on this. Level up only as a sorcery.) LEVEL 2-6 3/3 First strike LEVEL 7+ 4/4 Double strike

item.name: Survival Cache
item.text: You gain 2 life. Then if you have more life than an opponent, draw a card. Rebound (If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it as it resolves. At the beginning of your next upkeep, you may cast this card from exile without paying its mana cost.)

item.name: Time of Heroes
item.text: Each creature you control with a level counter on it gets +2/+2.
item.flavorText: No one spoke. There was no need. The threat of the Eldrazi presented a simple choice: lay down your weapons and die for nothing, or hold them fast and die for something.

item.name: Totem-Guide Hartebeest
item.text: When Totem-Guide Hartebeest enters the battlefield, you may search your library for an Aura card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.
item.flavorText: The kor track hartebeests in hopes of finding magic to help fight the Eldrazi.

item.name: Transcendent Master
item.text: Level up {1} ({1}: Put a level counter on this. Level up only as a sorcery.) LEVEL 6-11 6/6 Lifelink LEVEL 12+ 9/9 Lifelink Transcendent Master is indestructible.

item.name: Umbra Mystic
item.text: Auras attached to permanents you control have totem armor. (If an enchanted permanent you control would be destroyed, instead remove all damage from it and destroy an Aura attached to it.)
item.flavorText: "I have found the courage to face death—twice, if I must."

item.name: Wall of Omens
item.text: Defender When Wall of Omens enters the battlefield, draw a card.
item.flavorText: "I search for a vision of Zendikar that does not include the Eldrazi." —Expedition journal entry

item.name: Aura Finesse
item.text: Attach target Aura you control to target creature. Draw a card.
item.flavorText: "Although armor and auras can be similar, the brains required to use them are worlds apart." —Zilan, Makindi auramancer

item.name: Cast Through Time
item.text: Instant and sorcery spells you control have rebound. (Exile the spell as it resolves if you cast it from your hand. At the beginning of your next upkeep, you may cast that card from exile without paying its mana cost.)

item.name: Champion's Drake
item.text: Flying Champion's Drake gets +3/+3 as long as you control a creature with three or more level counters on it.
item.flavorText: "'Fraid of heights? Ride a horse. 'Fraid of missing out? Rein up a drake." —Trinda, Hada spy patrol

item.name: Coralhelm Commander
item.text: Level up {1} ({1}: Put a level counter on this. Level up only as a sorcery.) LEVEL 2-3 3/3 Flying LEVEL 4+ 4/4 Flying Other Merfolk creatures you control get +1/+1.

item.name: Crab Umbra
item.text: Enchant creature {2}{U}: Untap enchanted creature. Totem armor (If enchanted creature would be destroyed, instead remove all damage from it and destroy this Aura.)

item.name: Deprive
item.text: As an additional cost to cast Deprive, return a land you control to its owner's hand. Counter target spell.
item.flavorText: "That would have brought shame to you as a mage. Tell you what—I'll keep your secret." —Noyan Dar, Tazeem lullmage

item.name: Distortion Strike
item.text: Target creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn and is unblockable this turn. Rebound (If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it as it resolves. At the beginning of your next upkeep, you may cast this card from exile without paying its mana cost.)

item.name: Domestication
item.text: Enchant creature You control enchanted creature. At the beginning of your end step, if enchanted creature's power is 4 or greater, sacrifice Domestication.

item.name: Dormant Gomazoa
item.text: Flying Dormant Gomazoa enters the battlefield tapped. Dormant Gomazoa doesn't untap during your untap step. Whenever you become the target of a spell, you may untap Dormant Gomazoa.

item.name: Drake Umbra
item.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +3/+3 and has flying. Totem armor (If enchanted creature would be destroyed, instead remove all damage from it and destroy this Aura.)

item.name: Echo Mage
item.text: Level up {1}{U} ({1}{U}: Put a level counter on this. Level up only as a sorcery.) LEVEL 2-3 2/4 {U}{U}, {T}: Copy target instant or sorcery spell. You may choose new targets for the copy. LEVEL 4+ 2/5 {U}{U}, {T}: Copy target instant or sorcery spell twice. You may choose new targets for the copies.

item.name: Eel Umbra
item.text: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.) Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+1. Totem armor (If enchanted creature would be destroyed, instead remove all damage from it and destroy this Aura.)

item.name: Enclave Cryptologist
item.text: Level up {1}{U} ({1}{U}: Put a level counter on this. Level up only as a sorcery.) LEVEL 1-2 0/1 {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card. LEVEL 3+ 0/1 {T}: Draw a card.

item.name: Fleeting Distraction
item.text: Target creature gets -1/-0 until end of turn. Draw a card.
item.flavorText: "To distract an archmage would take incredible power. But for a simpleton, something sparkly will do." —Noyan Dar, Tazeem lullmage

item.name: Frostwind Invoker
item.text: Flying {8}: Creatures you control gain flying until end of turn.
item.flavorText: "We thought Zendikar's rage was kindled by its explorers and plunderers. But the world had sensed the stirrings of the Eldrazi." —The Invokers' Tales

item.name: Gravitational Shift
item.text: Creatures with flying get +2/+0. Creatures without flying get -2/-0.
item.flavorText: As they awakened, the Eldrazi reasserted their mastery over all of Zendikar's natural forces.

item.name: Guard Gomazoa
item.text: Defender, flying Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to Guard Gomazoa.
item.flavorText: It lingers near the outposts of the Makindi Trenches, inadvertently granting another layer of defense.

item.name: Hada Spy Patrol
item.text: Level up {2}{U} ({2}{U}: Put a level counter on this. Level up only as a sorcery.) LEVEL 1-2 2/2 Hada Spy Patrol is unblockable. LEVEL 3+ 3/3 Shroud Hada Spy Patrol is unblockable.

item.name: Halimar Wavewatch
item.text:
Level up {2} ({2}: Put a level counter on this. Level up only as a sorcery.) LEVEL 1-4 0/6
LEVEL 5+ 6/6 Islandwalk

item.name: Jwari Scuttler
item.flavorText: "Yeah, they've got a lot of meat. The only downside to eating 'em is that you often find human bones and body parts inside." —Jaby, Silundi Sea nomad

item.name: Lay Bare
item.text: Counter target spell. Look at its controller's hand.
item.flavorText: "It's good to learn from your failures, but I prefer to learn from the failures of others." —Jace Beleren

item.name: Lighthouse Chronologist
item.text:
Level up {U} ({U}: Put a level counter on this. Level up only as a sorcery.) LEVEL 4-6 2/4
LEVEL 7+ 3/5 At the beginning of each end step, if it's not your turn, take an extra turn after this one.

item.name: Merfolk Observer
item.text: When Merfolk Observer enters the battlefield, look at the top card of target player's library.
item.flavorText: "The structure gets bigger every hour, with hedrons coalescing even deep under the surface. If I could only get inside . . . ."

item.name: Merfolk Skyscout
item.text: Flying Whenever Merfolk Skyscout attacks or blocks, untap target permanent.
item.flavorText: "Emeria is a pleasant lie, a figment to hide Emrakul's hideous face. I can only hope to uncover a truth that lies deeper still."

item.name: Mnemonic Wall
item.text: Defender When Mnemonic Wall enters the battlefield, you may return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.
item.flavorText: "I'd build an entire fortress of them if I could." —Mzali, Lighthouse archmage

item.name: Narcolepsy
item.text: Enchant creature At the beginning of each upkeep, if enchanted creature is untapped, tap it.
item.flavorText: "It's so cute when it's sleeping, isn't it? Actually, it's still as abhorrent as ever, but at least it's not trying to kill us." —Noyan Dar, Tazeem lullmage

item.name: Phantasmal Abomination
item.text: Defender When Phantasmal Abomination becomes the target of a spell or ability, sacrifice it.
item.flavorText: Create an illusion so strong that it becomes another's reality, and you can become the master of all.

item.name: Reality Spasm
item.text: Choose one — Tap X target permanents; or untap X target permanents.
item.flavorText: From the moment the first Eldrazi spawn squirmed free, everything on Zendikar took on an adjusted meaning, a new slant toward or away from the waking giants.

item.name: Recurring Insight
item.text: Draw cards equal to the number of cards in target opponent's hand. Rebound (If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it as it resolves. At the beginning of your next upkeep, you may cast this card from exile without paying its mana cost.)

item.name: Regress
item.text: Return target permanent to its owner's hand.
item.flavorText: "Never look too deep, where the waters turn dark. What the sea has hidden there may not stay down forever." —Jaby, Silundi Sea nomad

item.name: Renegade Doppelganger
item.text: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, you may have Renegade Doppelganger become a copy of that creature until end of turn. (If it does, it loses this ability for the rest of the turn.)
item.flavorText: To truly know a creature, slither a mile in its tentacles.

item.name: Sea Gate Oracle
item.text: When Sea Gate Oracle enters the battlefield, look at the top two cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the other on the bottom of your library.
item.flavorText: "The secret entrance should be near."

item.name: See Beyond
item.text: Draw two cards, then shuffle a card from your hand into your library.
item.flavorText: Ancient lore locked in a mind driven mad is just as safe as when it was locked deep underground.

item.name: Shared Discovery
item.text: As an additional cost to cast Shared Discovery, tap four untapped creatures you control. Draw three cards.
item.flavorText: Riches must be divided, but real wealth can be shared.

item.name: Skywatcher Adept
item.text: Level up {3} ({3}: Put a level counter on this. Level up only as a sorcery.) LEVEL 1-2 2/2 Flying LEVEL 3+ 4/2 Flying

item.name: Sphinx of Magosi
item.text: Flying {2}{U}: Draw a card, then put a +1/+1 counter on Sphinx of Magosi.
item.flavorText: "A riddle is nothing more than a trap for small minds, baited with the promise of understanding."

item.name: Surrakar Spellblade
item.text: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, you may put a charge counter on Surrakar Spellblade. Whenever Surrakar Spellblade deals combat damage to a player, you may draw X cards, where X is the number of charge counters on it.

item.name: Training Grounds
item.text: Activated abilities of creatures you control cost up to {2} less to activate. This effect can't reduce the amount of mana an ability costs to activate to less than one mana.
item.flavorText: Under the master's eye, skills are honed sharper and spells cut deeper.

item.name: Unified Will
item.text: Counter target spell if you control more creatures than that spell's controller.
item.flavorText: "We're glad to be of service—to be an audience to your failure." —Maizah Shere, Tazeem lullmage

item.name: Venerated Teacher
item.text: When Venerated Teacher enters the battlefield, put two level counters on each creature you control with level up.
item.flavorText: "The unfathomable is upon us, students. I have no doubt you will rise to the occasion."

item.name: Arrogant Bloodlord
item.text: Whenever Arrogant Bloodlord blocks or becomes blocked by a creature with power 1 or less, destroy Arrogant Bloodlord at end of combat.
item.flavorText: "I would rather take my own head than be thwarted by a presumptuous wretch with a shield and a dream."

item.name: Bala Ged Scorpion
item.text: When Bala Ged Scorpion enters the battlefield, you may destroy target creature with power 1 or less.
item.flavorText: Fast and lethal, with a penchant for the weak and infirm.

item.name: Baneful Omen
item.text: At the beginning of your end step, you may reveal the top card of your library. If you do, each opponent loses life equal to that card's converted mana cost.
item.flavorText: "Ah, again it does not bode well for you."

item.name: Bloodrite Invoker
item.text: {8}: Target player loses 3 life and you gain 3 life.
item.flavorText: "The brood lineages unfolded across the world, each patterned after one of three progenitors, each a study in mindless consumption." —The Invokers' Tales

item.name: Bloodthrone Vampire
item.text: Sacrifice a creature: Bloodthrone Vampire gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: Some humans willingly offered up their blood, hoping it would grant the vampire families the strength to stave off the Eldrazi.

item.name: Cadaver Imp
item.text: Flying When Cadaver Imp enters the battlefield, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
item.flavorText: The mouth must be pried open before rigor mortis sets in. Otherwise the returning soul can find no ingress.

item.name: Consume the Meek
item.text: Destroy each creature with converted mana cost 3 or less. They can't be regenerated.
item.flavorText: "Why does it destroy? It does, and to talk of reasons wastes time and breath." —Nirthu, lone missionary

item.name: Consuming Vapors
item.text: Target player sacrifices a creature. You gain life equal to that creature's toughness. Rebound (If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it as it resolves. At the beginning of your next upkeep, you may cast this card from exile without paying its mana cost.)

item.name: Contaminated Ground
item.text: Enchant land Enchanted land is a Swamp. Whenever enchanted land becomes tapped, its controller loses 2 life.
item.flavorText: "The Na Plateau is lost. Do not ask what happened, and never return there." —Nirthu, lone missionary

item.name: Corpsehatch
item.text: Destroy target nonblack creature. Put two 0/1 colorless Eldrazi Spawn creature tokens onto the battlefield. They have "Sacrifice this creature: Add {1} to your mana pool."

item.name: Curse of Wizardry
item.text: As Curse of Wizardry enters the battlefield, choose a color. Whenever a player casts a spell of the chosen color, that player loses 1 life.
item.flavorText: "We must all push through the pain to heal our world." —Ayli, Kamsa cleric

item.name: Death Cultist
item.text: Sacrifice Death Cultist: Target player loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
item.flavorText: Death inevitably seduces all who study it.

item.name: Demonic Appetite
item.text: Enchant creature you control Enchanted creature gets +3/+3. At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice a creature.
item.flavorText: "Morality is just shorthand for the constraints of being powerless." —Ob Nixilis

item.name: Drana, Kalastria Bloodchief
item.text: Flying {X}{B}{B}: Target creature gets -0/-X until end of turn and Drana, Kalastria Bloodchief gets +X/+0 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: "If our former masters would have us kneel again, they shall feel our defiance slashed across their membranes."

item.name: Dread Drone
item.text: When Dread Drone enters the battlefield, put two 0/1 colorless Eldrazi Spawn creature tokens onto the battlefield. They have "Sacrifice this creature: Add {1} to your mana pool."
item.flavorText: Each Eldrazi ancient spawned a lineage of horrors in unfathomable shapes.

item.name: Escaped Null
item.text: Lifelink Whenever Escaped Null blocks or becomes blocked, it gets +5/+0 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: Left masterless by Kozilek, it wandered the wilds, raving in its ceaseless hunger.

item.name: Essence Feed
item.text: Target player loses 3 life. You gain 3 life and put three 0/1 colorless Eldrazi Spawn creature tokens onto the battlefield. They have "Sacrifice this creature: Add {1} to your mana pool."
item.flavorText: Eldrazi grow wherever something else dies.

item.name: Gloomhunter
item.text: Flying
item.flavorText: Scavengers both mundane and magical follow in its wake, feeding on the scraps of flesh and spirit it leaves behind.

item.name: Guul Draz Assassin
item.text: Level up {1}{B} ({1}{B}: Put a level counter on this. Level up only as a sorcery.) LEVEL 2-3 2/2 {B}, {T}: Target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn. LEVEL 4+ 4/4 {B}, {T}: Target creature gets -4/-4 until end of turn.

item.name: Hellcarver Demon
item.text: Flying Whenever Hellcarver Demon deals combat damage to a player, sacrifice all other permanents you control and discard your hand. Exile the top six cards of your library. You may cast any number of nonland cards exiled this way without paying their mana costs.

item.name: Induce Despair
item.text: As an additional cost to cast Induce Despair, reveal a creature card from your hand. Target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn, where X is the revealed card's converted mana cost.
item.flavorText: All the angel saw was her doom.

item.name: Inquisition of Kozilek
item.text: Target player reveals his or her hand. You choose a nonland card from it with converted mana cost 3 or less. That player discards that card.
item.flavorText: You will scream out your innermost secrets just to make it stop.

item.name: Last Kiss
item.text: Last Kiss deals 2 damage to target creature and you gain 2 life.
item.flavorText: "Romanticize it, glamorize it, call it what you will. To me, it will always be carnal, bloody murder." —Ayli, Kamsa cleric

item.name: Mortician Beetle
item.text: Whenever a player sacrifices a creature, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Mortician Beetle.
item.flavorText: To the soldier, war is famine; to the scavenger, a feast.

item.name: Nighthaze
item.text: Target creature gains swampwalk until end of turn. Draw a card.
item.flavorText: "To evade the brood lineages, one must be made dark to all the senses." —Traga, Zulaport runner

item.name: Nirkana Cutthroat
item.text: Level up {2}{B} ({2}{B}: Put a level counter on this. Level up only as a sorcery.) LEVEL 1-2 4/3 Deathtouch LEVEL 3+ 5/4 First strike, deathtouch

item.name: Nirkana Revenant
item.text: Whenever you tap a Swamp for mana, add {B} to your mana pool (in addition to the mana the land produces). {B}: Nirkana Revenant gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: Hate is an everlasting wellspring from which it is eternally sustained.

item.name: Null Champion
item.text:
Level up {3} ({3}: Put a level counter on this. Level up only as a sorcery.) LEVEL 1-3 4/2
LEVEL 4+ 7/3 {B}: Regenerate Null Champion.

item.name: Pawn of Ulamog
item.text: Whenever Pawn of Ulamog or another nontoken creature you control is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you may put a 0/1 colorless Eldrazi Spawn creature token onto the battlefield. It has "Sacrifice this creature: Add {1} to your mana pool."

item.name: Perish the Thought
item.text: Target opponent reveals his or her hand. You choose a card from it. That player shuffles that card into his or her library.
item.flavorText: It removed only one idea from her mind: defiance.

item.name: Pestilence Demon
item.text: Flying {B}: Pestilence Demon deals 1 damage to each creature and each player.
item.flavorText: "I have schemed too long to be supplanted by dead gods. If I cannot have this world, no one can."

item.name: Repay in Kind
item.text: Each player's life total becomes the lowest life total among all players.
item.flavorText: Sorin has gathered grudges for centuries, patiently awaiting the day he can exact the perfect vengeance.

item.name: Shrivel
item.text: All creatures get -1/-1 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: "Have you ever killed insects nibbling at your crops? I think that's what the Eldrazi believe they're doing to us." —Sheyda, Ondu gamekeeper

item.name: Skeletal Wurm
item.text: {B}: Regenerate Skeletal Wurm.
item.flavorText: Necromancers are judged by the most powerful undead they've ever created. There are those who have animated just a single being, yet are considered the pinnacle of their dark craft.

item.name: Suffer the Past
item.text: Exile X target cards from target player's graveyard. For each card exiled this way, that player loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
item.flavorText: Ulamog's tentacles, their touch like burning ice, rummaged through his soul and stung his memories one by one.

item.name: Thought Gorger
item.text: Trample When Thought Gorger enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on it for each card in your hand. If you do, discard your hand. When Thought Gorger leaves the battlefield, draw a card for each +1/+1 counter on it.

item.name: Vendetta
item.text: Destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated. You lose life equal to that creature's toughness.
item.flavorText: "Consider my debt to your kin paid in full." —Idrol, Guul Draz assassin

item.name: Virulent Swipe
item.text: Target creature gets +2/+0 and gains deathtouch until end of turn. Rebound (If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it as it resolves. At the beginning of your next upkeep, you may cast this card from exile without paying its mana cost.)

item.name: Zof Shade
item.text: {2}{B}: Zof Shade gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: It haunts the remnants of the Helix of Zof, leeching strength from the vast Eldrazi ruin.

item.name: Zulaport Enforcer
item.text:
Level up {4} ({4}: Put a level counter on this. Level up only as a sorcery.) LEVEL 1-2 3/3
LEVEL 3+ 5/5 Zulaport Enforcer can't be blocked except by black creatures.

item.name: Akoum Boulderfoot
item.text: When Akoum Boulderfoot enters the battlefield, it deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
item.flavorText: "If you're in Akoum and you glimpse a shadow overhead, the worst thing you can do is duck." —Chadir the Navigator

item.name: Battle Rampart
item.text: Defender {T}: Target creature gains haste until end of turn.
item.flavorText: "I will build no sanctuaries. The safety you seek can be won only by the sword." —Yannash, outpost builder

item.name: Battle-Rattle Shaman
item.text: At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may have target creature get +2/+0 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: The shaman rattles not to inspire a battle fury but to drown out the shrieks of those fleeing the Eldrazi.

item.name: Brimstone Mage
item.text: Level up {3}{R} ({3}{R}: Put a level counter on this. Level up only as a sorcery.) LEVEL 1-2 2/3 {T}: Brimstone Mage deals 1 damage to target creature or player. LEVEL 3+ 2/4 {T}: Brimstone Mage deals 3 damage to target creature or player.

item.name: Brood Birthing
item.text: If you control an Eldrazi Spawn, put three 0/1 colorless Eldrazi Spawn creature tokens onto the battlefield. They have "Sacrifice this creature: Add {1} to your mana pool." Otherwise, put one of those tokens onto the battlefield.

item.name: Conquering Manticore
item.text: Flying When Conquering Manticore enters the battlefield, gain control of target creature an opponent controls until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn.
item.flavorText: It speaks no commands but is always obeyed.

item.name: Devastating Summons
item.text: As an additional cost to cast Devastating Summons, sacrifice X lands. Put two X/X red Elemental creature tokens onto the battlefield.
item.flavorText: Things born in magma are always angry.

item.name: Disaster Radius
item.text: As an additional cost to cast Disaster Radius, reveal a creature card from your hand. Disaster Radius deals X damage to each creature your opponents control, where X is the revealed card's converted mana cost.

item.name: Emrakul's Hatcher
item.text: When Emrakul's Hatcher enters the battlefield, put three 0/1 colorless Eldrazi Spawn creature tokens onto the battlefield. They have "Sacrifice this creature: Add {1} to your mana pool."
item.flavorText: Wordlessly it leads its abhorrent brood.

item.name: Explosive Revelation
item.text: Choose target creature or player. Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a nonland card. Explosive Revelation deals damage equal to that card's converted mana cost to that creature or player. Put the nonland card into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

item.name: Fissure Vent
item.text: Choose one or both — Destroy target artifact; and/or destroy target nonbasic land.
item.flavorText: "Something down there has an appetite for what we're standing on. Let's hope it doesn't want seconds." —Samila, Murasa Expeditionary House

item.name: Flame Slash
item.text: Flame Slash deals 4 damage to target creature.
item.flavorText: After millennia asleep, the Eldrazi had forgotten about Zendikar's fiery temper and dislike of strangers.

item.name: Forked Bolt
item.text: Forked Bolt deals 2 damage divided as you choose among one or two target creatures and/or players.
item.flavorText: "Play no favorites. Everybody dies." —Sparkmage saying

item.name: Goblin Arsonist
item.text: When Goblin Arsonist is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you may have it deal 1 damage to target creature or player.
item.flavorText: With great power comes great risk of getting yourself killed.

item.name: Goblin Tunneler
item.text: {T}: Target creature with power 2 or less is unblockable this turn.
item.flavorText: "You never know what's going to be in goblin tunnels. Even in the best case, there will still be goblins." —Sachir, Akoum Expeditionary House

item.name: Grotag Siege-Runner
item.text: {R}, Sacrifice Grotag Siege-Runner: Destroy target creature with defender. Grotag Siege-Runner deals 2 damage to that creature's controller.
item.flavorText: "I don't think he's bringing in the mail . . . ." —Nundari, Sea Gate militia captain

item.name: Heat Ray
item.text: Heat Ray deals X damage to target creature.
item.flavorText: "There was clearly a scream. I'm not sure if there was a mouth." —Sachir, Akoum Expeditionary House

item.name: Hellion Eruption
item.text: Sacrifice all creatures you control, then put that many 4/4 red Hellion creature tokens onto the battlefield.
item.flavorText: Just when you thought you'd be safe, in the middle of an open field with no Eldrazi around for miles.

item.name: Kargan Dragonlord
item.text: Level up {R} ({R}: Put a level counter on this. Level up only as a sorcery.) LEVEL 4-7 4/4 Flying LEVEL 8+ 8/8 Flying, trample {R}: Kargan Dragonlord gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

item.name: Kiln Fiend
item.text: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, Kiln Fiend gets +3/+0 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: It traps an explosion within its stony skin.

item.name: Lagac Lizard
item.flavorText: Tracing their ancestry back to Zendikar's earliest forms of life, lagac lizards have seen the comings and goings of planeswalkers and the Eldrazi, and the rise of the vampire clans, none of which has changed them one bit.

item.name: Lavafume Invoker
item.text: {8}: Creatures you control get +3/+0 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: "Then the ancient masters themselves, towers of rapacity, rose and began their calamitous feast." —The Invokers' Tales

item.name: Lord of Shatterskull Pass
item.text:
Level up {1}{R} ({1}{R}: Put a level counter on this. Level up only as a sorcery.) LEVEL 1-5 6/6
LEVEL 6+ 6/6 Whenever Lord of Shatterskull Pass attacks, it deals 6 damage to each creature defending player controls.

item.name: Lust for War
item.text: Enchant creature Whenever enchanted creature becomes tapped, Lust for War deals 3 damage to that creature's controller. Enchanted creature attacks each turn if able.

item.name: Magmaw
item.text: {1}, Sacrifice a nonland permanent: Magmaw deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
item.flavorText: "The purpose of existence is simple: everything is fuel for the magmaw." —Jaji, magmaw worshipper

item.name: Ogre Sentry
item.text: Defender
item.flavorText: "You have to appreciate the genius of it. Why bother building defenses when you can just fill the pass with angry ogres?" —Javad Nasrin, Ondu relic hunter

item.name: Rage Nimbus
item.text: Defender, flying {1}{R}: Target creature attacks this turn if able.
item.flavorText: The settlement knew there was something strange about the cloud when the old priest Mandli suddenly grabbed an axe and ran screaming into the hills.

item.name: Raid Bombardment
item.text: Whenever a creature you control with power 2 or less attacks, Raid Bombardment deals 1 damage to defending player.
item.flavorText: Goblins in the first wave of a fire raid always bemoan the aim of everyone else.

item.name: Rapacious One
item.text: Trample Whenever Rapacious One deals combat damage to a player, put that many 0/1 colorless Eldrazi Spawn creature tokens onto the battlefield. They have "Sacrifice this creature: Add {1} to your mana pool."

item.name: Soulsurge Elemental
item.text: First strike Soulsurge Elemental's power is equal to the number of creatures you control.
item.flavorText: It draws its strength from those around it, but the pleasure of destruction is all its own.

item.name: Spawning Breath
item.text: Spawning Breath deals 1 damage to target creature or player. Put a 0/1 colorless Eldrazi Spawn creature token onto the battlefield. It has "Sacrifice this creature: Add {1} to your mana pool."
item.flavorText: Death by death, Kozilek's lineage spread.

item.name: Splinter Twin
item.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has "{T}: Put a token that's a copy of this creature onto the battlefield. That token has haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step."
item.flavorText: "I know just the person for that job."

item.name: Staggershock
item.text: Staggershock deals 2 damage to target creature or player. Rebound (If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it as it resolves. At the beginning of your next upkeep, you may cast this card from exile without paying its mana cost.)

item.name: Surreal Memoir
item.text: Return an instant card at random from your graveyard to your hand. Rebound (If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it as it resolves. At the beginning of your next upkeep, you may cast this card from exile without paying its mana cost.)

item.name: Traitorous Instinct
item.text: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. Until end of turn, it gets +2/+0 and gains haste.
item.flavorText: The horror lurched about like a puppet from a madman's nightmare, squeezing the life from its own kind.

item.name: Tuktuk the Explorer
item.text: Haste When Tuktuk the Explorer is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, put a legendary 5/5 colorless Goblin Golem artifact creature token named Tuktuk the Returned onto the battlefield.
item.flavorText: Remade by Eldrazi magic, Tuktuk inspired an entire clan of misguided goblins.

item.name: Valakut Fireboar
item.text: Whenever Valakut Fireboar attacks, switch its power and toughness until end of turn.
item.flavorText: "Just move very slowly, and for the love of Ula, do not get it mad." —Chadir the Navigator

item.name: Vent Sentinel
item.text: Defender {1}{R}, {T}: Vent Sentinel deals damage to target player equal to the number of creatures with defender you control.
item.flavorText: "Zendikar fortifies itself against the Great Threat, making sentries of sky, sea, and stone." —The War Diaries

item.name: World at War
item.text: After the first postcombat main phase this turn, there's an additional combat phase followed by an additional main phase. At the beginning of that combat, untap all creatures that attacked this turn. Rebound (If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it as it resolves. At the beginning of your next upkeep, you may cast this card from exile without paying its mana cost.)

item.name: Wrap in Flames
item.text: Wrap in Flames deals 1 damage to each of up to three target creatures. Those creatures can't block this turn.
item.flavorText: "Our pyromancer's flames may not have killed them, but they bought us the time we needed." —The War Diaries

item.name: Ancient Stirrings
item.text: Look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal a colorless card from among them and put it into your hand. Then put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order. (Cards with no colored mana in their mana costs are colorless. Lands are also colorless.)

item.name: Aura Gnarlid
item.text: Creatures with power less than Aura Gnarlid's power can't block it. Aura Gnarlid gets +1/+1 for each Aura on the battlefield.
item.flavorText: Kill a gnarlid with your first blow, or it'll cheerfully show you how it's done.

item.name: Awakening Zone
item.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put a 0/1 colorless Eldrazi Spawn creature token onto the battlefield. It has "Sacrifice this creature: Add {1} to your mana pool."
item.flavorText: The ground erupted in time with the hedron's thrum, a dirge of the last days.

item.name: Bear Umbra
item.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has "Whenever this creature attacks, untap all lands you control." Totem armor (If enchanted creature would be destroyed, instead remove all damage from it and destroy this Aura.)

item.name: Beastbreaker of Bala Ged
item.text:
Level up {2}{G} ({2}{G}: Put a level counter on this. Level up only as a sorcery.) LEVEL 1-3 4/4
LEVEL 4+ 6/6 Trample

item.name: Boar Umbra
item.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +3/+3. Totem armor (If enchanted creature would be destroyed, instead remove all damage from it and destroy this Aura.)
item.flavorText: "From in here, everything looks like dinner."

item.name: Bramblesnap
item.text: Trample Tap an untapped creature you control: Bramblesnap gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: A bramblesnap is formed by grafting together thirteen different plants that already hunger for meat.

item.name: Broodwarden
item.text: Eldrazi Spawn creatures you control get +2/+1.
item.flavorText: "The least of gods shall tower over the mightiest of mortals, and death shall reign over all." —Crypt of Agadeem inscription

item.name: Daggerback Basilisk
item.text: Deathtouch
item.flavorText: "Petrifying gaze, deadly fangs, knifelike dorsal spines, venomous saliva . . . Am I missing anything? . . . Toxic bones? Seriously?" —Samila, Murasa Expeditionary House

item.name: Gelatinous Genesis
item.text: Put X X/X green Ooze creature tokens onto the battlefield.
item.flavorText: Even as the world was left cracked and gory by the marauding Eldrazi, new life began to drip from its wounds.

item.name: Gigantomancer
item.text: {1}: Target creature you control becomes 7/7 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: "All life is driven by an indomitable will to survive. I simply turn that into something more . . . tangible."

item.name: Gravity Well
item.text: Whenever a creature with flying attacks, it loses flying until end of turn.
item.flavorText: Storms spread throughout Oran-Rief, ripping the skies with wind and rain. Airborne creatures sought shelter where they could.

item.name: Growth Spasm
item.text: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library. Put a 0/1 colorless Eldrazi Spawn creature token onto the battlefield. It has "Sacrifice this creature: Add {1} to your mana pool."

item.name: Haze Frog
item.text: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.) When Haze Frog enters the battlefield, prevent all combat damage that other creatures would deal this turn.
item.flavorText: Its breath leaves its prey too drowsy to struggle.

item.name: Irresistible Prey
item.text: Target creature must be blocked this turn if able. Draw a card.
item.flavorText: The baloth's instincts boiled, its muscles pulled taut, and its razor-spines bristled, as it turned to face—a runt meepling.

item.name: Jaddi Lifestrider
item.text: When Jaddi Lifestrider enters the battlefield, you may tap any number of untapped creatures you control. You gain 2 life for each creature tapped this way.
item.flavorText: Nature's arms encircle all who are willing to draw close.

item.name: Joraga Treespeaker
item.text: Level up {1}{G} ({1}{G}: Put a level counter on this. Level up only as a sorcery.) LEVEL 1-4 1/2 {T}: Add {G}{G} to your mana pool. LEVEL 5+ 1/4 Elves you control have "{T}: Add {G}{G} to your mana pool."

item.name: Kazandu Tuskcaller
item.text: Level up {1}{G} ({1}{G}: Put a level counter on this. Level up only as a sorcery.) LEVEL 2-5 1/1 {T}: Put a 3/3 green Elephant creature token onto the battlefield. LEVEL 6+ 1/1 {T}: Put two 3/3 green Elephant creature tokens onto the battlefield.

item.name: Khalni Hydra
item.text: Khalni Hydra costs {G} less to cast for each green creature you control. Trample
item.flavorText: "In ages past, bargains were struck and promises were made. Now we must collect on our debt. Begin the hymns." —Moruul, Khalni druid

item.name: Kozilek's Predator
item.text: When Kozilek's Predator enters the battlefield, put two 0/1 colorless Eldrazi Spawn creature tokens onto the battlefield. They have "Sacrifice this creature: Add {1} to your mana pool."
item.flavorText: It's difficult to outwit something that doesn't speak, strategize, or even think.

item.name: Leaf Arrow
item.text: Leaf Arrow deals 3 damage to target creature with flying.
item.flavorText: "Those who think the trees shall remain bystanders throughout this conflict shall be sorely mistaken." —Sutina, Speaker of the Tajuru

item.name: Living Destiny
item.text: As an additional cost to cast Living Destiny, reveal a creature card from your hand. You gain life equal to the revealed card's converted mana cost.
item.flavorText: "That our enemies are great only brings us greater hope."

item.name: Might of the Masses
item.text: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each creature you control.
item.flavorText: The Joraga elves never need ask a troll to leave their territory. They merely grant it their combined strength, and it can't resist embarking on a merry rampage.

item.name: Momentous Fall
item.text: As an additional cost to cast Momentous Fall, sacrifice a creature. You draw cards equal to the sacrificed creature's power, then you gain life equal to its toughness.
item.flavorText: It wasn't long until the elves had developed a use for every part of the Eldrazi.

item.name: Mul Daya Channelers
item.text: Play with the top card of your library revealed. As long as the top card of your library is a creature card, Mul Daya Channelers gets +3/+3. As long as the top card of your library is a land card, Mul Daya Channelers has "{T}: Add two mana of any one color to your mana pool."

item.name: Naturalize
item.text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
item.flavorText: "The scholars wept when we destroyed the hedron. I had no such pity. What would this world be like had we done so sooner?" —The War Diaries

item.name: Nema Siltlurker
item.flavorText: In one gargantuan bite, it will swallow not only you but also the riverbank you were standing on.

item.name: Nest Invader
item.text: When Nest Invader enters the battlefield, put a 0/1 colorless Eldrazi Spawn creature token onto the battlefield. It has "Sacrifice this creature: Add {1} to your mana pool."
item.flavorText: It nurtures its masters' glorious future.

item.name: Ondu Giant
item.text: When Ondu Giant enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.
item.flavorText: Some druids nurture gardens. Others nurture continents.

item.name: Overgrown Battlement
item.text: Defender {T}: Add {G} to your mana pool for each creature with defender you control.
item.flavorText: "Our enemy is nothing less than the end of all life. We shall not want for allies." —The War Diaries

item.name: Pelakka Wurm
item.text: Trample When Pelakka Wurm enters the battlefield, you gain 7 life. When Pelakka Wurm is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, draw a card.
item.flavorText: It eats what it wants to eat—which is anything that moves.

item.name: Prey's Vengeance
item.text: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Rebound (If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it as it resolves. At the beginning of your next upkeep, you may cast this card from exile without paying its mana cost.)

item.name: Realms Uncharted
item.text: Search your library for four land cards with different names and reveal them. An opponent chooses two of those cards. Put the chosen cards into your graveyard and the rest into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

item.name: Snake Umbra
item.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has "Whenever this creature deals damage to an opponent, you may draw a card." Totem armor (If enchanted creature would be destroyed, instead remove all damage from it and destroy this Aura.)

item.name: Spider Umbra
item.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has reach. (It can block creatures with flying.) Totem armor (If enchanted creature would be destroyed, instead remove all damage from it and destroy this Aura.)

item.name: Sporecap Spider
item.text: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
item.flavorText: "They don't move much, but then again, if you get caught in its web, it has all the time in the world to get to you." —Saidah, Joraga hunter

item.name: Stomper Cub
item.text: Trample
item.flavorText: "This one is only a yearling, but it would be wise to move away before we provide it with excellent hunting practice." —Samila, Murasa Expeditionary House

item.name: Tajuru Preserver
item.text: Spells and abilities your opponents control can't cause you to sacrifice permanents.
item.flavorText: "No more blood shall be spilled to satisfy another's deluded lust for power."

item.name: Vengevine
item.text: Haste Whenever you cast a spell, if it's the second creature spell you cast this turn, you may return Vengevine from your graveyard to the battlefield.
item.flavorText: Leave but a shred of root and it will return, bursting with vigor.

item.name: Wildheart Invoker
item.text: {8}: Target creature gets +5/+5 and gains trample until end of turn.
item.flavorText: "Life as we know it dangles on the brink of extinction. We must show the strength they would steal from us." —The Invokers' Tales

item.name: Sarkhan the Mad
item.text: 0: Reveal the top card of your library and put it into your hand. Sarkhan the Mad deals damage to himself equal to that card's converted mana cost. -2: Target creature's controller sacrifices it, then that player puts a 5/5 red Dragon creature token with flying onto the battlefield. -4: Each Dragon creature you control deals damage equal to its power to target player.

item.name: Angelheart Vial
item.text: Whenever you're dealt damage, you may put that many charge counters on Angelheart Vial. {2}, {T}, Remove four charge counters from Angelheart Vial: You gain 2 life and draw a card.
item.flavorText: It holds a whisper from Iona: "Persevere."

item.name: Dreamstone Hedron
item.text: {T}: Add {3} to your mana pool. {3}, {T}, Sacrifice Dreamstone Hedron: Draw three cards.
item.flavorText: Only the Eldrazi mind thinks in the warped paths required to open the hedrons and tap the power within.

item.name: Enatu Golem
item.text: When Enatu Golem is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you gain 4 life.
item.flavorText: Golems conjured from the debris of Enatu Temple provided a sturdy but expendable first line of defense against the Eldrazi.

item.name: Hedron Matrix
item.text: Equipped creature gets +X/+X, where X is its converted mana cost. Equip {4}
item.flavorText: The hedrons awoke along with the Eldrazi, forming superstructures that radiated overwhelming magic.

item.name: Keening Stone
item.text: {5}, {T}: Target player puts the top X cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard, where X is the number of cards in that player's graveyard.
item.flavorText: As it spins, dead voices shriek in an ever-increasing cacophony, rending the mind asunder.

item.name: Ogre's Cleaver
item.text: Equipped creature gets +5/+0. Equip {5}
item.flavorText: She adopted the weapon of the slave-lord Kazuul, and with it, all his cruelty.

item.name: Pennon Blade
item.text: Equipped creature gets +1/+1 for each creature you control. Equip {4}
item.flavorText: Draped with the pennon of a fallen outpost, the sword came to symbolize the peoples of Zendikar becoming one.

item.name: Prophetic Prism
item.text: When Prophetic Prism enters the battlefield, draw a card. {1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.
item.flavorText: "The explorer who found it got a bad deal when he sold it. He merely got rich."

item.name: Reinforced Bulwark
item.text: Defender {T}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to you this turn.
item.flavorText: Built of wood and iron. Held together by hope and prayer.

item.name: Runed Servitor
item.text: When Runed Servitor is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, each player draws a card.
item.flavorText: Scholars had puzzled for centuries over the ruins at Tal Terig. Its secrets had always lived within one rune-carved head.

item.name: Sphinx-Bone Wand
item.text: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, you may put a charge counter on Sphinx-Bone Wand. If you do, Sphinx-Bone Wand deals damage equal to the number of charge counters on it to target creature or player.
item.flavorText: Its host's final curse lies captured within.

item.name: Warmonger's Chariot
item.flavorText: The best defense is a good offense.

item.name: Eldrazi Temple
item.text: {T}: Add {1} to your mana pool. {T}: Add {2} to your mana pool. Spend this mana only to cast colorless Eldrazi spells or activate abilities of colorless Eldrazi.
item.flavorText: Each temple is a door to a horrible future.

item.name: Evolving Wilds
item.text: {T}, Sacrifice Evolving Wilds: Search your library for a basic land card and put it onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle your library.
item.flavorText: Every world is an organism, able to grow new lands. Some just do it faster than others.
